import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Header from './Header' import imgArticolo from '../img/articolo.png' import imgProblema from '../img/problem-solving.png' import AuthContext from '../Context/AuthContext' import ArticoliSalvati from './ArticoliSalvati' import ProblemiSalvati from './ProblemiSalvati' import { Container, Sidenav, Sidebar, Content, Nav, Icon, FlexboxGrid, Placeholder, Portal } from 'rsuite' import './Profile.css' export default function Profile() { const { Paragraph } = Placeholder const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) const [option, setOption] = useState(true) return (
{ user ?

{user.name} {user.surname}

:

} setOption(true)} icon={}> Articoli salvati setOption(false)} icon={}> Problemi salvati
{ option ? : }
) }
